title: Oatmeal Chocolate Peanut Butter No-Bake Candy Bars
directions: In a medium sized saucepan, melt together peanut butter, honey and coconut oil.
Remove from heat and add oats, chocolate chips and dried cranberries. Stir until combined and chocolate chips are melted.
Spread into a 9x13 pan. Refrigerate until hardened, about an hour. Store in refrigerator.
ingredients: 1/2 cup coconut oil (no substitutes, this is what gives its creamy texture and flavor)
